Mo. mechanic, wife claim Powerball jackpot

Peabody officer arraigned on charges of indecent assault, battery on a child

Frederick Wojick, 48, allegedly began indecently assaulting a female relative when the child was 10 and continued for four years, authorities said. (Globe, 1:14 p.m.)
